author: Engineezy
description:
Designing a Hopper for 10,000 Marbles using @solidworks 
•••
One thing I love about SOLIDWORKS is how quickly I can test different mechanisms using the mechanical mates feature.  Whether it’s gears, rack and pinions, lever, linkages, or cams, being able to mock up a mechanical design before having to fully commit to it is essential for quick iterations.  
•••
If you want to get started making your own design, check out SOLIDWORKS for Makers and use the code ‘ENGINEEZY’ at checkout for 20% off - link in bio!
•••
#engineering #mechanicaldesign #mechanicalengineering #engineeringstudent #mechanism #solidworks #ad
title: Designing a 10,000 marble hopper in SOLIDWORKS
